events.name: Structure of Electric Vehicle Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Structure of Electric Vehicle Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Understanding the supply chain can help businesses and governments understand how trade flows and resources will be affected by increased demand for EVs and thus, their inputs.
events.description: Understanding the supply chain can help businesses and governments understand how trade flows and resources will be affected by increased demand for EVs and thus, their inputs.

events.name: Competition in Lithium-Ion Battery Cells
events.wd_description: China and the United States appear to be the largest suppliers of lithium-ion battery cells in the future, with competition from Japan and South Korea.
events.description: China and the United States appear to be the largest suppliers of lithium-ion battery cells in the future, with competition from Japan and South Korea.

events.name: Trade Flows in Lithium-Ion Battery Cells
events.wd_label: Trade Flows in Lithium-Ion Battery Cells
events.wd_description: Due to the higher cost of transporting battery packs, international trade in EV battery packs is likely to remain low compared to trade in battery cells.
events.description: Due to the higher cost of transporting battery packs, international trade in EV battery packs is likely to remain low compared to trade in battery cells.

events.name: Vehicle Manufacturers' Decisions
events.wd_description: Vehicle manufacturers' decisions about where to produce EVs (and in what quantities) are likely to be the primary determinants in lithium-ion battery module and pack production locations.
events.description: Vehicle manufacturers' decisions about where to produce EVs (and in what quantities) are likely to be the primary determinants in lithium-ion battery module and pack production locations.

events.name: Value-Added for Lithium-Ion Batteries
events.wd_description: Much of the estimated U.S. value comes from pack assembly.
events.description: Much of the estimated U.S. value comes from pack assembly.

events.name: China's Role in Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: China's Role in Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: China is the largest supplier of lithium-ion battery cells.
events.description: China is the largest supplier of lithium-ion battery cells.

events.name: International Trade in Lithium-Ion Battery Cells
events.wd_label: International Trade in Lithium-Ion Battery Cells
events.wd_description: China and the United States are likely to be the largest suppliers of lithium-ion battery cells.
events.description: China and the United States are likely to be the largest suppliers of lithium-ion battery cells.

events.name: Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain in the Future
events.wd_label: Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain in the Future
events.wd_description: The structure of the electric vehicle battery supply chain is likely to be shaped by competition and trade flows.
events.description: The structure of the electric vehicle battery supply chain is likely to be shaped by competition and trade flows.

events.name: Pack Assembly
events.wd_description: The final stage of the battery supply chain, where modules are assembled into packs near the vehicle assembly location due to high transportation costs.
events.description: The final stage of the battery supply chain, where modules are assembled into packs near the vehicle assembly location due to high transportation costs.

events.name: Tesla Fremont Plant
events.wd_description: Assembles battery packs for Tesla vehicles using cells from the Nevada Gigafactory.
events.description: Assembles battery packs for Tesla vehicles using cells from the Nevada Gigafactory.

events.name: U.S. Pack Assembly
events.wd_description: The majority of pack assembly for U.S.-sold EVs occurs in the United States, reducing transportation costs.
events.description: The majority of pack assembly for U.S.-sold EVs occurs in the United States, reducing transportation costs.

events.name: Logistical Issues
events.wd_description: The logistics of transporting and storing lithium-ion batteries present challenges due to their size, weight, and safety concerns.
events.description: The logistics of transporting and storing lithium-ion batteries present challenges due to their size, weight, and safety concerns.

events.name: Transportation Challenges
events.wd_description: The cost and complexity of transporting large battery packs can be a significant logistical hurdle.
events.description: The cost and complexity of transporting large battery packs can be a significant logistical hurdle.

events.name: Storage Issues
events.wd_description: Proper storage of lithium-ion batteries is necessary to ensure safety and prevent degradation over time.
events.description: Proper storage of lithium-ion batteries is necessary to ensure safety and prevent degradation over time.
